sentences.english: And all the chores are traveling can make our perception of it.
sentences.chinese: 而一切紛擾的凡塵瑣事都能使我們感知它的意義。

sentences.english: Do not let what is going on around you whipsaw your strategy and your team.
sentences.chinese: 不要被周圍的紛擾阻礙了你的策略，破壞了團隊精神。

sentences.english: More silent than my shadow, I pass through the loftily covetous multitude.
sentences.chinese: 我比自己的影子更寂靜，穿過紛紛擾擾的貪婪。

sentences.english: I believe that here would never be any happy days in the world, and that period of student is also trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我相信世上永無快樂之日，而學生時期，亦多紛擾。

sentences.english: I often hanker after a little peace and respite from confusion, but it is really hard to come by.
sentences.chinese: 我常想在紛擾中尋出一點閒靜來，然而委實不容易。

sentences.english: But can you believe this year?
sentences.chinese: 不過你能否相信這一年的紛紛擾擾？

sentences.english: His mind was in such a turmoil that he couldn't get to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 內心的紛擾使他無法入睡。

sentences.english: Production delays also continue to plague the deployment of vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 生產延遲也繼續紛擾疫苗部署。

sentences.english: First , stop slinking away from all those nagging issues.
sentences.chinese: 首先，停止逃避那些紛紛擾擾的糾紛。

sentences.english: When it’s time to work, clear away all else and create.
sentences.chinese: 當你工作時，忘掉其他紛擾努力的去創造。

sentences.english: In garrulous, democratic India, the fallout is easier to gauge.
sentences.chinese: 在嘈雜和民主制度的印度，紛擾的塵埃更容易衡量。
他總結出了整個蘇聯的紛紛擾擾。

sentences.english: People go away on holiday and forget all about it.
sentences.chinese: 人們紛紛去度假，忘記了所有的紛擾。

sentences.english: But why not pay your respects to the original that started all the fuss?
sentences.chinese: 但是爲什麼不把你的尊重投向這些紛擾開始的起源？

sentences.english: She fussed about,scarcely able to hide her impatience.
sentences.chinese: 她是在無謂紛擾，幾乎不能掩蓋其不耐煩。

definition: to drift with the waves and go with the flow (idiom); to follow the crowd blindly
